Customize the document types available to your organization. Document types have their own configurable and reusable templates.

::: {.attn}

## Prerequisites

- [x] {{< var link.login >}}
- [x] You are a [{{< fa hand >}} Customer Admin]{.bubble} or assigned another role with sufficient permissions to perform the tasks in this guide.[^1] 

:::

## Add document types

1. In the left sidebar, click **{{< fa gear >}} Settings**.

2. Under Documents, select **Document Types**.

3. Click **{{< fa plus >}} Add Document Type**.

4. Enter in the document type details: 

    - Provide a **[name]{.smallcaps}** and **[description]{.smallcaps}**.
    - Indicate the display **[order]{.smallcaps}** of this document type in lists and menus.
    - Toggle whether this document type should **[auto initialize when model is created]{.smallcaps}**.
    - Select the model stakeholder types[^2] that should have **[write permissions]{.smallcaps}** for this document type.

5. Click **Create Document Type** to add your document type.
